de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical

Class CentroidLinkageMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.CentroidLinkageMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinkageMethod

    @Alias(value={"centroid","upgmc"})
 @Reference(authors="A. K. Jain and R. C. Dubes",
           title="Algorithms for Clustering Data",
           booktitle="Algorithms for Clustering Data, Prentice-Hall")
public class CentroidLinkageMethod
extends Object
implements LinkageMethod
    Centroid linkage clustering method, aka UPGMC: Unweighted Pair-Group Method using Centroids. Reference:

    A. K. Jain and R. C. Dubes
    Algorithms for Clustering Data
    Prentice-Hall

    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Method Detail

      • combine

        public double combine(int sizex,
                      double dx,
                      int sizey,
                      double dy,
                      int sizej,
                      double dxy)
        Description copied from interface: LinkageMethod
        Compute combined linkage for two clusters.
        Specified by:
        combine in interface LinkageMethod
        Parameters:
        sizex - Size of first cluster x before merging
        dx - Distance of cluster x to j before merging
        sizey - Size of second cluster y before merging
        dy - Distance of cluster y to j before merging
        sizej - Size of candidate cluster j
        dxy - Distance between clusters x and y before merging
        Returns:
        Combined distance
